sources.title: Icebreaker | Full Movie | Action Adventure | Sean Astin | Bruce Campbell
sources.description:
Icebreaker - When terrorists take over a mountain top ski lodge packed with tourists, the FBI is faced with the task of getting the innocent out alive before the terrorists detonate a nuclear bomb buried in the mountain.
2000.  Stars: Sean Astin, Bruce Campbell, Stacy Keach

metadata.Plot: Matt Foster, son of a cleaner, realizes his fiancée Meg's wealthy father Bill considers him, a 'Ski Patrol Bum' in the Killington resort, far beneath their social status. Matt gets an unexpected change to prove himself when hey finally planned to announce their wedding plans after nasty criminal Timmy disgusts his hijacked pilot so much that he chooses to crash there. Timmy's boss, medically terminal terrorist Carl Greig, kills him after learning his load, radio active material stolen from Russia, is intact, and has his lieutenant Frantz send in a team to retrieve it. There is also an FBI team on his trail, lead by agent Will Langley, but Matt and a forester are the ones who accidentally face the extremely violent fiends...
metadata.Actors: Sean Astin, Bruce Campbell, Stacy Keach
